metadata.title: CVE-2022-2819 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0211.

notes.note: rodrigo-zaiden> faulty code was added in version 8.2.2672, with commit b2cb6c8b, so, versions earlier than that are not affected. there is a possibility that version 8.2.2301 (commit 752fc692) is also affected, but the PoC provided didn't reproduce in this version. Anyway, at least versions prior to 8.2.2301 are not affected.

criterions.comment: vim package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
